director.name: 艾尔达·申格拉亚 Eldar Shengelaya

introduction: Kote Mardjanishvili's "Samanishvilis dedinatsvali" (Step-mother of Samanishvili) is considered up to nowadays as one of the best Georgian comedy film. This film is marked not only by the brilliant ensemble of the actors, but make a base for solid traditions characteristic for Georgian comedy film – tendency of organic merging of comic and dramatic.Dorevolyutsionnaya Georgia early XX century. Plato Samanishvili - impoverished descendant of the ancient noble family. His father-old widower announces his wish to marry. The son of horror. If stepmother son, Platon will have to share it with him meager estate, and the four children himself. He therefore decided to go to find a future spouse for the father to be childless. Travel like Plato ends successfully: the bride is found, according to ancient Georgian customs kidnapped and taken to the groom. However, after the due date at the main hero of the film and appears chernoglazy shalovlivy brother...
